name: MANNING RIVER AERO CLUB INCORPORATED
about: The Manning River Aero Club Incorporated is a reputable flying school and club located at Taree Airport on the Mid-North Coast of New South Wales, Australia. We offer comprehensive flight training for all licence levels, from recreational to commercial, including Recreational Pilot Licence (RPL), Private Pilot Licence (PPL), and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL). Our training programs also include Night VFR Rating, Design Feature Endorsements, and specialized ratings such as Flight Instructor Rating and Instrument Rating. Students learn on our Cessna 172 aircraft, with flexible training schedules to accommodate full-time or part-time commitments. Our experienced instructors provide classroom and one-on-one assistance, ensuring a safe, effective, and enjoyable learning environment. Whether you're pursuing a career in aviation or a flying hobby, the Manning River Aero Club is dedicated to helping you achieve your flying goals.
services:
["Training Aircraft
Recreational Pilot Licence (RPL)
Private Pilot Licence (PPL)
Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL)
Night VFR Rating"]
